entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:02 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: W 30 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
